segments.text: I see the woman at the sink, her back turned to the chaos unfolding behind her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water overflows from the sink, creating a small lake on the floor beneath her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't believe she hasn't noticed; does she not feel the cold droplets splashing on her feet?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The children are so unaware of the danger they are in.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is stretching his small body towards the cookie jar, like a little acrobat.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But that stool looks so unstable, I can almost see it tipping in slow motion.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: And the girl is standing there, one arm raised, waiting for her prize like a tiny statue of anticipation.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's all just so innocent, yet so reckless at the same time.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel a knot in my stomach, imagining the potential disaster.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The garden outside looks so peaceful compared to the impending chaos inside.
segments.speaker: PAR
